question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Clean Development mechanism?
1. It allows an Annex B Party in Kyoto Protocol to implement an emission-reduction project in developing countries.
2. Through these projects parties can earn saleable certified emission reduction (CER) credits which can be counted towards meeting Kyoto targets.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Clean Development mechanism allows an Annex B Party in Kyoto Protocol to implement an emission-reduction project in developing countries. Through these projects parties can earn saleable certified emission reduction (CER) credits which can be counted towards meeting Kyoto targets.
